title: EP 10: BUY or BYE-Nance? Binance BNB Token Economics Case Study
description:
Trying a new format for videos. Let me know if you prefer this format or the previous ones!

This is a case study of Binance's native token, BNB. Bookmarks so you can jump to your preferred sections:

  • Quick PSA on the term "token economics": 00:51 //
  • Market design of BNB token: 01:22 //
  • (Token Design) Token structure: monetary policy and valuation: 04:14 //
  • (Token Design) Financial incentives of BNB tokens : 11:12

Want more in-depth content? Join our Token Economics 201 course at www.education.economicsdesign.com!

Watch on YouTube for visual learners and Substack for those who prefer reading.
dc:creator: Lisa JY Tan
